metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30145 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A format string vulnerability in mpv through 0.33.0 allows user-assisted remote attackers to achieve code execution via a crafted m3u playlist file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30145` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmpv2 - 0.34.1-1ubuntu5
mpv - 0.34.1-1ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mpv package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.34.1-1ubuntu5').
